amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Broadband Grants program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 110-290 to reduce funds in the bill for grants to finance broadband transmission in rural areas by $8,910,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 66 - 360 (Roll no. 805).
